infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: We use speech recognition to help students practice spelling words by speaking them aloud. This allows students to spell words using their voice instead of typing.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We use the microphone to listen to your child's spelling practice when they use voice input mode. Audio is processed in real-time and not recorded or stored.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app does not access your photo library. This permission is required by a third-party library but is not used.
